message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you take $30. It's best to settle now before inflation eats into our potential gains.
I'm proposing a fairer split. Since I'm rejecting your offer, I'll take 60% and you can have 40%. We can avoid further inflation and get our shares now.
Bob, let's be realistic. This is my last offer before inflation significantly impacts both of us.  I'll take $60, leaving you with $40. It's a better deal than what you'll get in the next round.
